meanings: pleasant, pleased (with/about), enjoyable, joyful, cheerful, happy, merry

vlive.korean: [손등 자랑이 한창 즐거울 나이] 자체 진행인가요? [Excited to show the back of his hand] Are you hosting yourself? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.1
vlive.english: [Excited to show the back of his hand] Are you hosting yourself?

vlive.korean: 즐거울 것 같아요. I think it will be fun. 듣기 View video 포토피플(PHOTO PEOPLE) : 포토피플 in TOKYO 11부_ep.1 톱모델 지롤라모&포피즈의 케미폭발♨ 화보촬영!
vlive.english: I think it will be fun.

vlive.korean: 신날 거고 즐거울 거예요! It will be fun and exciting! 듣기 View video V PICK! : [BLACKPINK] 달곰쿠마카이리오주황아 보고있어!? 젠츄리챙 또 일등했어💕 (BLACKPINK's acceptance speech)
vlive.english: It will be fun and exciting!

vlive.korean: 오늘도 즐거울 거예요. - 청춘! Today is going to fun! - Youth! 듣기 View video iKON : 아이콘 3월 5일 '고무줄다리기' 많이 사랑해주세요❤️
vlive.english: Today is going to fun! - Youth!

vlive.korean: [n주년 이렇게 즐거울 거라니 nnn주년까지 럽리할래] 5주년에요? During our fifth anniversary? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [LOVELYZ] 4주년이 이렇게 즐겁다니 1112주년까지 럽리할래! (LOVELYZ looking back on the past)

examples.korean: Although I expected to enjoy living in the country, in fact the reverse is true. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 나는 시골 생활이 즐거울 것이라고 예상했지만 사실은 그 정반대였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Although I expected to enjoy living in the country, in fact the reverse is true. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: If time flies when you're having fun, it hits the afterburners when you don't think you're having enough. (Jef Mallett) 듣기 Add to Wordbook 즐거울 때 시간이 날아간다면, 시간이 부족하다 싶을 때 시간은 가속 엔진을 가동시킨다. (제프 말렛, 시간명언) 명언/속담
examples.english: If time flies when you're having fun, it hits the afterburners when you don't think you're having enough. (Jef Mallett) Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He anticipates great pleasure from his visit to France. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 프랑스 여행이 매우 즐거울 것으로 기대하고 있다. Friendict Level English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He anticipates great pleasure from his visit to France. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: It would be merry as the day is long if you would come to my birthday party. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 당신이 내 생일 잔치에 온다면 더 없이 즐거울 것이다. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: It would be merry as the day is long if you would come to my birthday party. Add to Wordbook
